app_update_required_reason: To use this app, download the latest version
login_help_alert: If you forgot the portal password, enter the University page and perform the procedure to reset the password. If you are an external user and have any problem, write to us by email
password_requirements: Choose a password between 8 and 18 characters that contains at least 1 letter and 1 number. Only the following special characters can be used: Period (.), underscore (_), and hyphen (-).
picture_features_title: Select a photo with the following characteristics:
send_message_hint: Write us any questions you have.
send_message_success_body: Your message has been sent successfully.
unlink_confirm_question: Are you sure you want to unlink this device?
exit_confirm_question: Are you sure you want to quit?
device_unlinked_successfully: Your device has been successfully unlinked
picture_not_found_title: Upload a photo to complete your card.
picture_not_found_message: We did not find a photo in our database for your card.
picture_request_sent_successfully: Your photo change request has been sent correctly.
permission_not_found_title: We could not generate your card.
permission_not_found_message: Sorry, we did not find enough data to generate your card. Please contact us.
device_already_registered_title: You can only have one device registered.
device_already_registered_message: You already have a registered device or this device is associated with another account
change_external_password_subtitle: You can change your password if you are logged in as an external user.
change_external_password_success_subtitl: Your password has been successfully updated.
change_external_password_error_subtitle: You can only change your password if you are logged in as an external user.
faqs_empty_subtitle: No FAQ information found. Please try again later.
error_message: The operation couldn't be completed, please try again.
network_error_message: You have lost your network connectivity. Please check your settings.
session_expired_error_message: Your access has expired, please log in again.
device_already_unlinked_error_message: Apparently this device has already been unlinked, please verify your identity again.
email_not_found_error_message: We couldn't find your email in our database, please try again later.
access_code_error_message: There was an error generating your access code, please try again.
device_info_error_message: Apparently the necessary information to login could not be obtained, please try again.
incorrect_auth_request: Sorry, the login request was submitted incomplete, please try again.
server_error_message: Sorry, a server error has occurred, please try again.
type_error_message: Sorry, the information received was not processed correctly, please try again.
internal_server_error_message: An internal server error has occurred
qr_code_message: Este código de identificación es personal e intransferible, únicamente para efectos de ingreso a las áreas institucionales del campus por parte del titular. Su utilización está sujeta a los reglamentos de la Universidad del Norte.
